sense.gloss: to decorate, to ornament, to adorn
to display, to exhibit, to put on show, to arrange
to mark (e.g. the day with a victory), to adorn (e.g. the front page), to grace (e.g. the cover)
to affect (a manner), to keep up (appearances), to embellish, to dress up, to be showy, to be pretentious

sdata.j: アメリカ↑人↑↓じん↓は↑一般↑↓いっぱん↓に↑着|飾↑↓きかざ↓る|ことを↑好↑↓この↓まない。
sdata.e: Americans, in general, don't like to dress up.

sdata.e: Our teacher was a beautiful lady, but was not the type of person who dressed up.
